technologies.title: Angular
technologies.description: Working in Angular since it's beta release. When creating complex frontend whose requirements are well defined then I go for Angular due to it's Typscript support and less dependent on third party modules for core features like routing and HTTP request.

technologies.title: React
technologies.description: After starting journey with Angular I started looking for other options in this frontend framework and found out React Library to be interesting and started learning and building projects in it. When I need somehting to be built fast and light weight with flexilinity to choose my own libraries I go with React.

technologies.title: Vue
technologies.description: With same time as react I came to know about Vue with somewhere introducing it as best of both worlds from Angular and React. I really like Vue with it's concept of single page components without JSX.
